1.0.0.name: wordpress/font-resizer
1.0.0.description: This plugin allows you to give the visitors of your site the option to change the font size. The plugin acts over jQuery and saves the settings in a cookie. So the visitor see the same font size if they revisit your site. Which content is going resized, the resize steps and other options you can set on the admin page called "font-resizer".
